titleStmt.title: The copie of a letter from Dvblin in Ireland, dated march 29, 1642 by Sir John Temple Knight ..., written to D. Temple, D. of divinity and pastor of battersey, neare London : relating the manner of taking the castle of Carrick-Maine, six miles from Dublin, by Sir Simon Harcourt and some English under his command : together with the manner of his hurt and death withsome other passages.
titleStmt.author: Temple, John, Sir, 1600-1677.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
